resources.string: There is something wrong with your connection.\nCheck your connection by accessing some webpage through the browser.
To proceed you need permission to use the device accounts manager. Otherwise it will not be possible to use this function.
You need permission to use the accounts manager.\n\n To allow, click: Settings > Permission and enable the optionContacts.
If you deny access to the camera, you will not be able to use the scanner function to scan the QR code or take a picture of the contents that will be stored in the containers.

For QR Code reader or taking a picture of the contents that will be stored in the containers, it is necessary to give permission to use the camera.\n\n To allow, click: Settings > Permission and enable the option Camera.
If you deny access to the device location will not be possible to find your current location.
To find your current location is necessary permission to use the device\'s GPS. To enable, click on: Settings > Permissions and enable the Location.
If access to the storage of the device is denied, you will not be able to save pictures taken of the content.
To save pictures taken of the content, permission to use the storage of the device is required.\n\n To allow, click: Settings > Permission and enable the optionStorage.
Permission to access the camera required.
